name: Cinderella VR
description: Join Cinderella in a family-friendly virtual reality adventure through the classic fairy tale! Be transported to a magical land with pumpkin carriages, fairy godmothers and medieval castles! Cinderella's story unfolds in front of you in virtual reality- and invites you to play along with interactive minigames!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 759.2 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better Storage: 759.2 MB available space
